Data.text_description:
The probability of temperature being high (A=1) is 0.4193. 
For those with temperature being low (A=0), the probability of talent being high (B=1) is 0.3422. 
For those with temperature being high (A=1), the probability of talent being high (B=1) is 0.2158. 
For those with talent being low (B=0), the probability of blood pressure being high (C=1) is 0.2526. 
For those with talent being high (B=1), the probability of blood pressure being high (C=1) is 0.0841. 
For those with talent being low (B=0), the probability of income level being high (D=1) is 0.4176. 
For those with talent being high (B=1), the probability of income level being high (D=1) is 0.2048.
